mema dushitha ka්ramaya thula balayata pathwana hama janadhipathiwarayakutama thamanta pakshapatha agawinisuruwarayaku awashya wi thibenne ee nisaya.winishchayakarawarun sandaha widhiwidhanadan apata agawinisuruwarayaku ho usas adhikaranaye winisuruwaku doshabhiyogayak magin pahakirima sandaha thibena widhiwidhana ha eewa janadhipathita erehiwa idiripath karena doshabhiyogayak sandaha panawa thibena widhiwidhanawalin wenaswanne kesedayi soya baliya hakiya.aanduka්rama wyawasthawe 107 (2) waganthiya anuwa usas adhikaranawala (shreshtadhi karanaye ho abhiyachanadhikaranaye) oppu wi athi wishamathawa ho abalathawa padanam kotagena nopamini mantha්riwarunda athuluwa parlimenthuwe mulu mantha්ri sankhyawen bahuthara sankhyawak wisin sammatha karana lada parlimenthu yojanawak janadhipathiwaraya wetha idiripath kirimen pasuwa chodanalabhi agawinisuruwaraya ho usas adhikaranaye winisuruwaraya thanathuren iwath kala hakiya.mita pera salaka balana lada aakarayata pa්rajathantha්rawadi wenath boho ratawala doshabhiyogayakin pamanak iwath kala yuthu ganayata watena thanathuru darannan sandaha athi kara thibena doshabhiyoga widhiwidhana eka samanaya.
